programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Anioł i złoczyńca
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, wszechstronny złoczyńca, wraca do zdrowia. Opiekuje się nim Penelope Worth, kwakierka. Quirt musi wybrać między swoim światem a światem, w którym żyje Penelope.

programme.title: Dni Nienawiści
programme.desc: Benson poluje na gang bandytów, którzy zabili jego rodziców, brata i siostry poza jedną - Susy, którą zwyrodnialcy chcą mieć dla siebie!

programme.title: Requiem dla Gringo
programme.desc: Wyjątkowy eurowestern, którego bohaterem jest astrolog noszący garnitur w panterkę.

programme.title: Czas Masakry
programme.desc: Poszukiwacz złota i jego wiecznie pijany przyrodni brat muszą walczyć z ranczerem i jego sadystycznym synem po tym, jak ci przejmują kontrolę nad ich farmą.

programme.title: Piętnaście Stryczków Dla Mordercy
programme.desc: Oskarżeni o ohydną zbrodnię, której nie popełnili, członkowie dwóch rywalizujących ze sobą gangów uciekają przez rozwścieczonym tłumem. Chronią się w opuszczonym forcie, biorąc wcześniej dwóch zakładników.

programme.title: Sześciu Łowców Głów do Masakry
programme.desc: Gubernator Kansas wynajmuje sześciu rewolwerowców, aby obalić despotyczne rządy samozwańczego bossa Abilene, który przetrzymuje kilku zakładników, w tym rodzinę gubernatora.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Ślepa Nienawiść
programme.desc: Kiedy w miasteczku zostaje zamordowany indiański wódz, sympatyzujący z nim były szeryf próbuje powstrzymać Indian przed zemstą.

programme.title: Biały Apacz
programme.desc: Bandyci napadają na grupę osadników i zabijają wszystkich oprócz ciężarnej kobiety, którą ratują Indianie. Kobieta umiera przy porodzie, ale wódz Biały Niedźwiedź adoptuje chłopca, nadaje mu imię Gorejące Niebo i wychowuje jak własnego syna.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Dwa Rewolwery i Tchórz
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen, młody rewolwerowiec, który pracuje jako cyrkowiec, jest świadkiem zabójstwa kilku banitów dokonanego przez ich przywódcę. Sam zostaje uznany za winnego tego czynu. Steffen cierpi na kompleks, który blokuje go przed jakąkolwiek przemocą i sprawia, że wydaje się tchórzliwy. Kiedy młody chłopiec zostaje porwany, musi znaleźć sposób, aby odzyskać spokój.

programme.title: Zemsta Ringo
programme.desc: Dwóch poszukiwaczy przygód ratuje życie mężczyzny, który ma na plecach wytatuowaną mapę skarbów. Druga potrzebna mapa znajduje się na plecach szeryfa. Zaczyna się polowanie.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Pojedynek ranczerów
programme.desc: Amerykański western w wersji z polskim lektorem - Pojedynek ranczerów.Spór o spadek po zmarłym ranczerze przeradza się w krwawy konflikt.

programme.title: Łowca Głów w Trinity
programme.desc: Mieszkańcy miasteczka Trinity postanawiają wynająć osławionego łowcę nagród, aby chronił ich przed groźnym gangiem meksykańskich bandytów terroryzujących okolicę.

programme.title: Piąte - Nie Zabijaj
programme.desc: Po napadzie na bank grupa banitów zbiera się w opuszczonym saloonie. Okazuje się, że brakuje łupu, a bandyci zaczynają się wzajemnie obrażać.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Ben i Charlie Na Dzikim Zachodzie
programme.desc: Dwóch wspólników przy użyciu forteli i oszustw, próbuje napełnić swoje puste kieszenie. Dwójka okrada bank, a następnie zmaga się z podłym i chciwym szeryfem.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado to uzbrojony, zawodowy hazardzista. Przyjeżdża on do małego miasteczka Silver Mine, gdzie wda się w walkę z niejakim Tucanem. Djurado zdobędzie połowę miejscowego saloonu, którego druga część należy do Barbary.

programme.title: Dorwać Chaco
programme.desc: Chaco to Meksykanin, który zdaje się uciekać przed każdym. Zostaje oskarżony o morderstwo paru bydlaków.

programme.title: Prawo Dana Candiego
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach, tragiczna historia uciekiniera z Saskatchewan Almighty Voice (Gordon Tootoosis), Indianina Cree, którego aresztowano za kradzież państowej własności.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Samuraj
programme.desc: Koniec XIX wieku. Cesarz Japonii wysyła w prezencie prezydentowi USA świętego kucyka. Ten jednak zostaje skradziony przez Indian, którzy żądają miliona dolarów okupu. Szeryf Blackjack Gideon oferuje dostarczenie okupu i odebranie kucyka.

programme.title: Nawet Django ma Swoją Cenę
programme.desc: Narzeczona Django została uprowadzona. Ten musi ją uratować, ale nie jest to takie proste. Porywaczami są bracia Cortez i ich gang.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Zabójczy Dzieciak
programme.desc: Bezwzględny i okrutny kapitan Ramirez poluje na rewolucjonistów w poszukiwaniu Świętego - prawego przywódcy meksykańskiej rewolucji przeciwko Federales.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros
programme.desc: Samotny rewolwerowiec tropi członków bandy, która zabiła jego przyjaciół.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Chcesz Żyć To Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Młody kowboj, Johnny, grając w sfałszowaną grę w pokera, zmuszony jest zastrzelić jednego z pozostałych graczy.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Czerwień Cassidy
programme.desc: Kobieta powraca do rodzinnego miasta, w poszukiwaniu zemsty za zabójstwo kochanka, który zginął z rąk jej byłego narzeczonego. Rozdarta między miłością, nienawiścią, lojalnością i pragnieniem zemsty, kobieta traci panowanie nad swoim planem.

programme.title: Miasteczko Abilene
programme.desc: Pierwszy raz w kolorze! Klasyczny amerykański western z 1946 roku z Randolphem Scottem w roli głównej: Miasteczko Abilene. Szeryf stara się zapobiec sporom między osadnikami na Dzikim Zachodzie po wojnie secesyjnej.

programme.title: Komancze
programme.desc: Wspólne wysiłki rządu USA i Komanczów mające na celu wynegocjowanie traktatu pokojowego są sabotowane przez zbuntowanych Indian i krótkowzrocznego Amerykańskiego komisarza.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Django... Adiós!
programme.desc: Django jest szeryfem, który zostaje niesłusznie aresztowany za kradzież skrzyni pełnej dolarów, przeznaczonych na budowę szkoły i kościoła w Silver City.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. He's assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and learn about the emir's activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: Ridin' the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agent's claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Men's investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotel's holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark tracks down the James Brothers who seek revenge on the law following the death of their half-brother.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Also, look for legendary tough guy actor lee Van Cleef as Jesse James.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Bean discovers that a young vagabond he jailed for a minor offense may be involved in a major unsolved gold heist.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, a con involving the Haunted Hills draws Judge Roy's attention. Letty is among those who undergo hypnosis to recall long past events.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The Mingo False Faces are accused of a series of thefts sweeping the valley.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The film's original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Yodelin' Kid from Pine Ridge
programme.desc: Cowboy icon Gene Autry is framed for murder in this tale of warring cattlemen and turpentiners. The music driven western from director Joseph Kane (Flame of Barbary Coast) includes such familiar faces as Smiley Burnette, Charles Middleton, and Betty Bronson. In between gunshots you'll hear plenty of traditional cowboy songs, including She'll Be Coming 'Round The Mountain, and Red River Valley, plus Gene's version of Sing Me a Song of the Saddle.

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomez's camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. There's plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, you'll be glad to know there's no singing in this one. It's just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Come on Cowboys
programme.desc: The Mesquiteers are back! This time they're helping out a friend who has been framed for counterfeiting. And one of their pledges is to look after his young daughter. Robert Livingstone, Ray Corrigan, and Max Terhune star in this Republic Pictures feature, bringing all the usual laughs and action you know from the other Mesquiteer films!

programme.title: Last of the Clintons
programme.desc: Icon of early talking pictures, Harry Carey (Red River), portrays the rugged Trigger Carson, a noble cowboy who infiltrates an outlaw gang in order to expose their rackets. Ordered to kidnap a young girl, his identity is revealed and he is forced to fight his way out of the gang and back to safety. Already 56 by the time he signed on to do this and a series of Westerns for Berke Productions, the stately Carrey (who netted an Oscar nomination four years later) was widely lauded at the time for adding a great deal of maturity and respectability due to his undeniable presence and strong performances.

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to San Pablo, Mexico, to find out what's behind the trouble an American tungsten mine is having. When they arrive, they discover the mine has been closed, the wells are all poisoned and the town is in the grip of a malaria epidemic. To make matters worse, the lawmen have been followed by four gunslingers determined to give the American troubleshooters all the trouble they can handle - and more. Russell Hayden stars.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney tangle with a gang of robbers who have hijacked an Army payroll. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark is challenged by a band of freight-car robbers led by Apache chief Geronimo. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, plus Chief Yowlachie and Emile Meyer. Directed by William Witney.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quantrill and His Raiders
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective tasked with the mission to infiltrate the Quantrill gang before the Lawrence Kansas massacre.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Plus, Bruce Bennet stars as Quantrill, with Steve Darrell as Bloody Bill Anderson.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Judge Declares a Holiday
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge meets up with a con man who comes to towns, arranges horse races then skips town with the receipts and all the money that was bet. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an outlaw gang plans to take over the town by getting Judge Bean to resign over false charges of misconduct. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are turned away from a town due to the Black Plague.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A young man seeks vengeance against the Shawnee for the murder of his parents. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: Young Buffalo Bill
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in this highly fictionalized account of Bill Cody's life from director Joseph Kane (Dakota, Flame of Barbary Coast). What it lacks in accuracy is made up for with adventure, as well as and some of Roy's great cowboy songs, including 'Blow Breeze Blow', and 'Rollin' Down to Santa Fe'. Other stars include George 'Gabby' Hayes, Chief Thundercloud, and the lovely Pauline Moore (Young Mr. Lincoln, Charlie Chan at Treasure Island)

programme.title: Boots and Saddles
programme.desc: When a young Englishman inherits a ranch, none other than Gene Autry takes up the challenge of turning the Brit into a real westerner. He convinces the Brit to use the ranch to raise horses, but things quickly grow complicated. Look for the usual cast of characters from Republic Pictures, including Smiley Burnette (as the irresistible Frog Millhouse!). Songs include Take Me Back To My Boots and Saddle, and Ridin the Range.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny O'Neil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects O'Neill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than he'd ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: A group of disparate travelers journey together through the Southwest soon find trouble when they all get gold fever. The action and drama are heightened when they discover gold. The Tall Texan (Lloyd Bridges), is a suspected murderer in the custody of sheriff Lee J. Cobb, and now stranded in Indian territory after a Comanche attack on their stagecoach.

programme.title: Stagecoach to Denver
programme.desc: Ride the outlaws' highway! Allan Rocky Lane stars as Red Ryder, shootin' and fightin' his way to justice in this old slugfest from Republic Pictures. This time he's a stagecoach driver battling a crooked land commissioner and his cohorts, including a sheriff on the take. Robert Blake costars as Little Beaver!

programme.title: Feud of the Trail
programme.desc: Feud of the Trail places the dashing Tom Tylerr, a B-Western star (and the original Captain Marvel) in dual roles; as a man seeking justice against a band of outlaws, and the bands vicious gang leader. Capably directed by helmer Robert F. Hill (Flash Gordon, Tarzan the Fearless), and shot at the iconic Lazy A Ranch outside of Los Angeles, the film follows Tom Wade, an honorable man with a face thats nearly identical to nefarious gang leader Jack Granger. Using this to his advantage, Wade exploits his similar looks to impersonate the gangster and infiltrate his band of ruffians.

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In an episode called Koniakers, G-Men Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett investigate how U.S. currency in a bank vault was replaced by counterfeit money. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West. In this episode, Pat and Stoney get reports that a man is selling salted mines to investors. The two G-men are determined to discover the truth. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie investigate a woman named Cattle Kate who seems to be the source of cattle ranches suffering major losses in Sweetwater, Wyoming.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Cattle Kate: Jean Parker. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie finds herself caught in the middle of a train heist led by the Sam Bass gang.In order to get to Sam, she pretends to be a waitress and flirts with one of his henchmen. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955..Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Don Haggerty plays Sam Bass, while Denver Pyle is his henchman, Bill Hayes.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a couple of con men attempt to snare Letty into their scheme and spirit her away to San Francisco. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go up against two thieves with stolen identities. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that a young man's uncle is behind the recent attacks against him. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgan's Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But it's also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden, Eve Miller and Barton MacLane star in this thrilling tale of Southern saboteurs attacking railroad construction at the dawn of the Civil War. Oscar nominee Ray Nazarro (The Bullfighter and the Lady) directed this tale yanked from the pages of American history, a frontier time built by bullets, dynamite, and bloodstained spikes!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a woman's love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Public Disturbance
programme.desc: Grupa The Janoskians została zaproszona na występ podczas pełnej gwiazd imprezy urodzinowej Alison, córki słynnego potentata medialnego (Mike Tyson). Występ w ostatniej chwili odwołano, więc ekipa jajcarzy postanowiła przejąć nudną imprezę i pokazać, co znaczy zakłócanie porządku.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Uuu! Halloween Madei
programme.desc: Aby uniknąć kłopotów w wigilię Wszystkich Świętych, Madea i jej paczka zostają w domu, aby mieć oko na nastoletnią córkę Briana. Ale kiedy nadchodzi godzina czarownic, rozpętuje się piekło.

programme.title: Przekleństwo Jeremy'ego
programme.desc: Nieśmiały i słabo rozwinięty młody człowiek o niesamowitych umiejętnościach uczy się radzenia sobie z życiem w małym skorumpowanym mieście.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson (Michael Keaton) postanawia wystawić na Broadwayu sztukę. Ma nadzieję, że to pomoże mu wskrzesić karierę, którą zbudował na roli kinowego superbohatera.

programme.title: W zasięgu strzału
programme.desc: Liberty, żona producenta broni, zostaje porwana przez mężczyznę imieniem Joe. Celem Joego jest pomścić córkę, która zginęła w strzelaninie w szkole, a za winnych tej tragedii uznaje twórców broni użytej w tym celu.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Counterattack
programme.desc: Elitarny najemnik ucieka do dżungli po tym, jak został wrobiony w zabójstwo potentata naftowego. Towarzyszy mu reporterka, która ma dowód jego niewinności.

programme.title: Tucker: Konstruktor Marzeń
programme.desc: Konstruktor tworzy rewolucyjne projekty samochodów, które wstrząsają całym przemysłem motoryzacyjnym.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Dziewczynka ocalała po trzęsieniu ziemi opuszcza rodzinę, która myśli, że nie udało jej się przeżyć.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Sekretarka (Secretary)
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta (Maggie Gyllenhaal) zostaje wypuszczona ze szpitala psychiatrycznego i znajduje pracę jako sekretarka wymagającego prawnika (James Spader). Ich zawodowa relacja zamienia się w sadomasochistycznie seksualną.

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Tajemnice Los Angeles
programme.desc: Trzech detektywów Jack Vincennes (Kevin Spacey), Bud White (Russell Crowe) oraz Ed Exley (Guy Pearce) łączą swoje siły, aby rozwiązać zagadkę seryjnych morderstw popełnionych przez gang. Otacza ich zarówno prestiżowa, jak i mroczna strona przemysłu filmowego.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock egzystuje w świecie wiecznej ciemności, jednak przenikająca go czerń jest wypełniona dźwiękami, zapachami, smakami i teksturami, których inni nie są w stanie odczuć.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Counterattack
programme.desc: Elitarny najemnik ucieka do dżungli po tym, jak został wrobiony w zabójstwo potentata naftowego. Towarzyszy mu reporterka, która ma dowód jego niewinności.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Do diabła z miłością
programme.desc: Gdy niepoprawny kobieciarz i bawidamek, dziennikarz piszący do czasopisma dla mężczyzn spotyka autorkę o feministycznych poglądach i własnych tajemnych planach, rozpoczyna się klasyczne starcie płci, zmierzające nieuchronnie do szczęśliwego finału.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: Bodom
programme.desc: Czwórka nastolatków wybiera się nad jezioro Bodom, by odtworzyć scenę brutalnego morderstwa sprzed lat.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)
programme.desc: Siejąca śmierć eksplozja wulkanu i największe trzęsienie ziemi w Los Angeles niszczy całe miasto i dziesiątkuje jego populację. Najlepszy lokalny reporter John Benson wykorzystuje szansę, by opowiedzieć historię miasta od wewnątrz, starając się znaleźć rodzinę zagubioną w chaosie.

programme.title: Public Disturbance
programme.desc: Grupa The Janoskians została zaproszona na występ podczas pełnej gwiazd imprezy urodzinowej Alison, córki słynnego potentata medialnego (Mike Tyson). Występ w ostatniej chwili odwołano, więc ekipa jajcarzy postanowiła przejąć nudną imprezę i pokazać, co znaczy zakłócanie porządku.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Wyścig z czasem
programme.desc: W przyszłości, gdzie czas to dosłownie pieniądz, a proces starzenia zatrzymuje się w wieku 25 lat, jedyną metodą na utrzymanie się przy życiu jest zarobek, kradzież lub odziedziczenie pieniędzy.

programme.title: Tucker: Konstruktor Marzeń
programme.desc: Konstruktor tworzy rewolucyjne projekty samochodów, które wstrząsają całym przemysłem motoryzacyjnym.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Kelnerzy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds występuje w tej przezabawnej komedii o grupie kelnerów i kelnerek poszukujących sensu życia podczas oczekiwania na kolejny duży napiwek.

programme.title: Niedokończony interes
programme.desc: Ciężko pracujący właściciel małego przedsiębiorstwa oraz jego dwóch wspólników podróżują do Europy, aby dobić targu ich życia. Jednak zwykła podróż służbowa przeradza się w coś zupełnie niewyobrażalnego…

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.
